rules.name: SMSVAValidationCheck
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2) AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6)) OR ((7 OR 8) AND (9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12))
rules.label: SMSVAValidationCheck

decisions.description: To check the outage state value on the incident
decisions.name: SPEN_Check_Outage_stage
decisions.label: Check Outage stage

rules.name: SPEN_Has_Confirmed_or_Partially_Confirmed_Outage_state
rules.label: Has Confirmed or Partially Confirmed Outage state

rules.name: BothSMSVAInvolved
rules.conditionLogic: ((11 OR 12) AND (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4)) AND ((9 OR 10) AND (5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8))
rules.label: BothSMSVAInvolved

rules.name: CheckOnlySMS
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2) AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6) AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10
rules.label: CheckOnlySMS

rules.name: CheckOnlyVA
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2) AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 ) AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10
rules.label: CheckOnlyVA

formulas.description: To check the Blackout window period for SMS alert
formulas.name: SPEN_compareBetweenBlackoutAndNow
formulas.expression: if(OR(AND(ISBLANK({!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourSMSBlackoutWindow.SPEN_StartTimeinTextFormula__c}),ISBLANK({!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourSMSBlackoutWindow.SPEN_EndTimeinTextFormula__c})),(AND((UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourSMSBlackoutWindow.SPEN_StartTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00')) < UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourSMSBlackoutWindow.SPEN_EndTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00'))), OR(AND((UNIXTIMESTAMP({!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}) < UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourSMSBlackoutWindow.SPEN_StartTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00'))), (UNIXTIMESTAMP({!$Flow.CurrentDateTime})< UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourSMSBlackoutWindow.SPEN_EndTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00')))),(AND((UNIXTIMESTAMP({!$Flow.CurrentDateTime})>UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourSMSBlackoutWindow.SPEN_StartTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00'))),(UNIXTIMESTAMP({!$Flow.CurrentDateTime})>UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourSMSBlackoutWindow.SPEN_EndTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00')))))))) , (AND((UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourSMSBlackoutWindow.SPEN_StartTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00'))>UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourSMSBlackoutWindow.SPEN_EndTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00'))), (UNIXTIMESTAMP({!$Flow.CurrentDateTime})<UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourSMSBlackoutWindow.SPEN_StartTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00'))), (UNIXTIMESTAMP({!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}) > UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourSMSBlackoutWindow.SPEN_EndTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00')))))), true, false)

formulas.description: To check the blackout window period for Voice alert
formulas.name: SPEN_compareBetweenBlackoutAndNowForVA
formulas.expression: if(OR(AND(ISBLANK({!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourVABlackoutWindow.SPEN_StartTimeinTextFormula__c}),ISBLANK({!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourVABlackoutWindow.SPEN_EndTimeinTextFormula__c})),(AND((UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourVABlackoutWindow.SPEN_StartTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00')) < UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourVABlackoutWindow.SPEN_EndTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00'))), OR(AND((UNIXTIMESTAMP({!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}) < UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourVABlackoutWindow.SPEN_StartTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00'))), (UNIXTIMESTAMP({!$Flow.CurrentDateTime})< UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourVABlackoutWindow.SPEN_EndTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00')))),(AND((UNIXTIMESTAMP({!$Flow.CurrentDateTime})>UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourVABlackoutWindow.SPEN_StartTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00'))),(UNIXTIMESTAMP({!$Flow.CurrentDateTime})>UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourVABlackoutWindow.SPEN_EndTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00')))))))) , (AND((UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourVABlackoutWindow.SPEN_StartTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00'))>UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourVABlackoutWindow.SPEN_EndTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00'))), (UNIXTIMESTAMP({!$Flow.CurrentDateTime})<UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourVABlackoutWindow.SPEN_StartTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00'))), (UNIXTIMESTAMP({!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}) > UNIXTIMESTAMP(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) +' ' + {!SPEN_GetIVROperatingHourVABlackoutWindow.SPEN_EndTimeinTextFormula__c}+':00')))))), true, false)

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}
